questions.text: If it takes 5 machines 5 minutes to make 5 parts, how long would it take 100 machines to make 100 parts?
What comes next in the pattern? 2, 6, 12, 20, __ ?
You have a 3-liter and a 5-liter container. How can you measure exactly 4 liters?
options: Fill the 5-liter and pour into 3-liter until it’s full
questions.correctAnswer: Fill the 5-liter and pour into 3-liter until it’s full

questions.text: Which number logically completes the sequence? 1, 4, 9, 16, 25, __ ?

A farmer has 17 sheep, and all but 9 run away. How many are left?
What is the missing letter in the series? J, F, M, A, M, J, __ , A
You’re in a room with 3 light switches and a closed door. One switch controls a light bulb inside the room. How can you find out which one it is by entering the room only once?
options: Turn one switch on, wait, turn it off, then turn another one on and enter
questions.correctAnswer: Turn one switch on, wait, turn it off, then turn another one on and enter
